problem.markdown:
>>In November 2016, which district had the lowest Breastfeeding within 1 hour after delivery (%)?<< [[(Dessert District), Dog District, Fish District, Insect District]]
[explanation] Dessert District had the lowest Breastfeeding within 1 hour after delivery (%) during November 2016 [explanation]
problem.p: In November 2016, which district had the lowest Breastfeeding within 1 hour after delivery (%)?

optioninput.label: In November 2016, which district had the lowest Breastfeeding within 1 hour after delivery (%)?

div.p: Dessert District had the lowest Breastfeeding within 1 hour after delivery (%) during November 2016
